Text: Education in Greece:  Primary education is divided into kindergarten lasting one or two years, and primary school spanning six years (ages 6 to 12).

2:
--------------------
Text: Education in Greece:  Secondary education comprises two stages: Gymnasio (variously translated as Middle or Junior High School), a three-year school, after which students can attend Lykeion (an academically oriented high school) or Vocational training.
Triplets:<Greece
3:
--------------------
Text: Education in Greece:  Higher Tertiary education is provided by Universities and Polytechnics, Technological Educational Institutes (T.E.I., 1983–present) and Academies which primarily cater for the military and the clergy.
